2.7.7: ✨ **New Feature (Workflow):** Added an 'Extract from Text' button to all automation tabs to simplify pasting work codes.
🚀 **Enhancement (Demand):** Demand automation now supports Rajasthan and includes minor bug fixes.
🚀 **Enhancement (UI):** Autocomplete for Panchayat names now properly supports arrow key navigation and fixes freezing issues.
🐞 **Bug Fix (Reports):** Fixed CSV and PDF exports to properly support Hindi fonts and improve PDF data organization.
🐞 **Bug Fix (eMB Verify):** Added missing imports to resolve errors in the eMB Verify tab.
